mapper.select:
select p.m_id p_id, p.m_name p_name, m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_url
from sys_module m join sys_module p on m.m_pid = p.m_id
where m.m_pid is not null and m.m_ismenu=1 and m.m_status='55' and
p.m_pid is null and p.m_ismenu=1 and p.m_status='55'
order by p.m_id,m.m_id

select distinct p.m_id p_id, p.m_name p_name, m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_url
from sys_user u join sys_ur ur on u.u_id = ur.u_id join sys_role r on ur.ro_id = r.ro_id join sys_rm rm on r.ro_id = rm.ro_id join sys_module m on rm.m_id = m.m_id join sys_module p on m.m_pid = p.m_id
where m.m_pid is not null and m.m_ismenu=1 and m.m_status='55' and
p.m_pid is null and p.m_ismenu=1 and p.m_status='55' and
r.ro_status='55' and u.u_status='55' and
u.u_id=#{userId}
order by p.m_id,m.m_id

select
m.m_id, m.m_name, m.m_url
from sys_user u join sys_ur ur on u.u_id = ur.u_id join sys_role r on ur.ro_id = r.ro_id join sys_rm rm on r.ro_id = rm.ro_id join sys_module m on rm.m_id = m.m_id
where m.m_pid is not null and m.m_ismenu=1 and m.m_status='55' and
r.ro_status='55' and u.u_status='55' and
u.u_id=#{userId} and
m.m_id in (2510,2515,2520,2525,2540,2545)
order by m.m_id
